```{r}
library(opendatascot)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
ods_all_datasets() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(name == "Healthy Life Expectancy") %>% 
  select(uri)
```

```{r}
ods_structure("healthy-life-expectancy")
```



```{r}
ods_dataset("healthy-life-expectancy",
            age = "0-years",
            simdQuintiles = "all",
            urbanRuralClassification = "all",
            measureType = "count") %>% 
  filter(age == "0-years")
```
